function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of Bluetooth low energy for contact tracing","Impact":"Potential risk of false alerts and inaccurate proximity events","Mitigation":"Implement additional validation methods for contact tracing, such as symptom-based reporting","Technologies":"Symptom-based reporting, AI algorithms","People":"Users of the app","Owner":"Application developers, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Storage of contact data on the user's device","Impact":"Risk of privacy concerns if data is accessed without user consent","Mitigation":"Enhance data encryption and implement strict access controls","Technologies":"Data encryption, access controls","People":"Users of the app","Owner":"Application developers, cybersecurity experts"},{"Description":"Retention of contact data on the central server","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential exposure of user identifiers","Mitigation":"Implement data anonymization techniques and allow users to delete their data from the server","Technologies":"Data anonymization, user-controlled data deletion","People":"Users of the app","Owner":"Application developers, cybersecurity experts"}]}
